rows.name: example_2
rows.value: Example 2: Show list of completed items

rows.name: index_1_button_@item.id
rows.value: Set item at index 0 to completed

rows.name: id_button_@item.id
rows.value: Set item with id "id_1" to completed

rows.name: index_plus_1_button_@item.id
rows.value: Set item at index (this + 1) to uncompleted

rows.name: example_2_b
rows.value: Example 8: change list source using variables

rows.name: toggle_all_button
rows.value: Toggle all (does not work if values different)
